name: Facebook Flat Fixer
description: Will work ONLY with the Facebook Flat extension installed: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/facebook-flat-%E2%80%94-new-desig/kadbillinepbjlgenaliokdhejdmmlgp
additional_info:
Changes the following:
- Fixes the arrows in the left sidebar
- Hides the enable/disable switch which I found ugly
- Adds padding and the block attribute to the time/location on the right of posts, stopping them from overlapping and allowing multi-line contents for locations
